questions.author: Bob Dobolina
questions.question: Does Ember solve more problems than it creates?
questions.notes: I am asking because it seems like it is supposed to simplify things but it makes so many other things so much harder.

questions.author: Some guy
questions.question: How can I make ember pass variables between routes if they are not in the model?
questions.notes: For example, I wouldd like a user to be able who selects accessibility settings to have them applied on all pages.

questions.author: Some gal
questions.question: How do I force ember to pass a validation token from page to page?
questions.notes: I do not want it in my model but I want this to pass around like a state variable.
